match_info.title: South Africa vs India, Final, ICC Mens T20 World Cup 2024
match_info.toss: India won the toss and opt to Bat

venue_details.ends: Malcolm Marshall End, Joel Garner End

balls.commentary: full and shaping into off-stump, Rohit prods forward and knocks it just wide of mid-on, they scamper across for one
BEAUTIFUL! Pitched up full and slanting across outside off, Kohli pressed forward and opened the face of the bat to cream the drive through point, sublime timing and placement

you could never tell he's been short of runs! Pitched up full and straight this time, wrong line and length, too easy for Kohli who whips it away through square leg with his signature flick, it races away to the ropes
full and slanting across outside off, Kohli presses forward and drives it towards extra cover, was just a knock so they get two
good length delivery slanting across outside off, Kohli has a close look at it before letting it go, great carry through to de Kock, he took that at about head-hieght

more runs for Kohli! Marco Jansen pitches it right up on off-stump again, Kohli prods forward and just pushes it back down the ground gently, all timing and it beats Nortje who gives it a long chase from long-on, the slide wasn't enough to reel it back in, superb start for India and Kohli

a little streaky but four nonetheless! Length delivery on off-stump, Rohit pressed back looking to cut, bit of extra bounce and it got a little big on him before taking a thick outside edge, flew past first slip and ran down to the third man ropes
to the third man ropes again but very intentional this time! Full on middle, Rohit leans in and reverse-sweeps this past the man at short third, two boundaries to start the over!
full on off-stump, Rohit presses forward and pushes it to short cover

Maharaj gets his man! Indian lose an early wicket and it's the in-form Rohit Sharma! This is exactly what South Africa would've wanted! Tossed up full on off-stump, Rohit leant across and swept it hard, timed it well but did not keep it down and it went straight to Klaasen at backward square leg. He moved to his left and took it fairly low, good catch and South Africa are absolutely delighted. Things have gone to plan. Rohit c Klaasen b Maharaj 9(5) [4s-2]
good length delivery just outside off, Pant prods forward and steers it to backward point

Two in the over for Maharaj! Pant had a sheepish look on his face as soon as South Africa went up in appeal and he's gone for a duck! Dream start for South Africa, they've got rid of Pant as well. This was floated up full just outside off, Pant leant in looking to sweep and ended up taking it on the full, it hit the cue end of the bat and lobbed up, simple catch for QDK as it looped over him and landed just behind the stumps. The sweep has led to the downfall of both Rohit and Pant now. Pant c de Kock b Maharaj 0(2)
length delivery outside off, left alone by Kohli
length delivery just outside off, Kohli eases it into the covers, watchfully played that
pitched up full on off-stump, driven nicely but straight to mid-on
good length delivery just outside off, Kohli presses back and punches it towards backward point
good length delivery on off-stump, Suryakumar Yadav hangs back and eases it to backward point

chipped in the air but just over mid-on! Full on off-stump, Suryakumar Yadav got forward looking to whip this up and over mid-wicket, hit the outer half of the bat and just about lobbed over the man at mid-on who'd turned around and started running back, Rickelton the sub

excellent work from Miller in the deep, Tossed up full outside off, Kohli got to the pitch of the ball and crunched it through extra cover, desperate dive from Miller who sprinted across from long-off, kept it down to two
length delivery on off-stump, Kohli presses back and eases it into the off-side
length delivery on off-stump, Kohli presses back and blocks
Miller won't stop this one! In fact he doesn't even get close, length delivery outside off, width on offer and Kohli slapped it away though to the extra cover ropes, much wider of Miller this time
full on middle nurdled into the leg-side
length delivery outside off, cut away nicely but he can't find the gap at point
length delivery outside off, eased down to third man
full just outside off, driven towards mid-off, not well timed and they pinch a quick single

In the air and taken! South Africa are absolutely pumped as they've picked up a third wicket in the powerplay! This is a sensational start now as SKY makes his way back to the pavilion as well. A length delivery on off-stump, Suryakumar Yadav shuffled across a touch and picked it up before pulling it away towards deep backward square leg, didn't look like he put everything into it, it was hit into the wind and it floated down to Klaasen who was there, he ran to his left and tumbled before taking it low. Another great catch and South Africa know the value of that wicket. Suryakumar Yadav c Klaasen b Rabada 3(4)
promotion for Axar and he starts with a lovely shot! Full and straight on the pads, easy pickings for Axar as he clips it away to the deep square leg ropes
full just outside off, Axar prods forward and drives it into the covers
short of length outside off, Axar gets on top of the bounce and slaps it towards backward point, misfield there but he only concedes one
tossed up full on off-stump, worked away towards deep mid-wicket
length delivery outside off, turns in and Kohli presses back before working it away towards deep mid-wicket
full on leg-stump, worked away gently towards mid-wicket for another single
very full just outside off, driven back down the ground to long-on
very full on leg-stump, clipped away to deep square leg
full just outside off, Kohli leans in and works it to deep mid-wicket, just six singles off the last powerplay over
length delivery outside off, eased out towards deep point
length delivery on off-stump, Axar hangs back and blocks it into the off-side
length delivery on off-stump, knocked out towards deep cover
good length delivery angling into leg-stump, thuds into the thigh pad as Kohli looks to work it into the leg-side
banged in short on middle, was a slower delivery too, Kohli waited for it and kept the pull down, only a single to backward square leg
length delivery on leg-stump, clipped away to deep mid-wicket
tossed up full on middle-leg, pushed down the ground to long on
tossed up full on off-stump, whipped away to deep mid-wicket

just over the man! Tossed up full on middle, Axar leant in and went for a slog-sweep across the line, didn't time it all that well but it just about cleared Klaasen at deep mid-wicket, first six of the innings
tossed up full on middle, driven straight to cover
goes again but doesn't time it, full on middle, Axar went for another slog-sweep but ended up dragging it towards deep square leg off the bottom half
length delivery just outside off, Kohli presses back and works it away to deep mid-wicket, happy to just knock it around and rotate the strike at this stage is Virat
length delivery just outside off, punched down the ground to long-off
length delivery outside off, Axar presses back and cuts it away hard to deep point, can't get it finer
full on middle, Kohli leans in and works it away past mid-wicket, happy to just rotate the strike again

these are crucial blows from Axar! Axar knows it's his job to attack and he's doing it very effectively, tossed up full on middle, was in the slot, Axar leant in and slog-swept it clean over the cow corner ropes
length delivery just outside off, punched straight to cover off the backfoot
length delivery just outside off, mistimed to mid-wicket as he looked to work it away
false start, length delivery pushed very wide outside off, Kohli lets it go
full on middle, pushed down the ground to long on
full on off-stump, Axar prods forward and knocks it into the covers
full on middle, Axar defends, looked like it skidded through a touch
length delivery on middle, Axar presses back and works it towards mid-wicket, just one
they run hard and get two, length delivery turning down leg, Kohli worked it away past short fine-leg and they charged back for two, the throw back was good but Kohli made it easily

full just outside off, Kohli leans in and sweeps it hard to cow corner, put it in the gap but Stubbs is very quick down there, cuts it off with a slide and throws it back in no time, they'll still get two

fuller than a length outside off, Axar looks to slog and it flies off a thick edge in front of deep third. Goes on a couple of bounces to the fielder. Dravid was seen having a chat with both batters during the drinks break and the message to Axar seems clear
back of a length across off, off-cutter at 129kph, Kohli stands tall and punches to deep point
back of a length just outside off, 136kph, Axar rides the bounce and dabs it to deep third
dug in on short of length, climbs on Kohli as he looks to pull, rushes him for pace as well, and he mistimes it through square leg
short of length just outside off, slower one, Axar dabs it to deep third
half-volley down the leg-side, Kohli looks to flick it away but misses
short of length at the body, cramps him on the pull shot and Kohli is hit on the glove as he goes for it. The ball rolls wide of de Kock
tossed up on middle and off, Kohli gets forward and flicks it to midwicket
tossed up on leg stump, turning into the pads, Kohli flicks through square leg
full ball on leg stump, Axar goes for a big slog-sweep but gets an under-edge onto pad
back of a length, turning down leg, Kohli hangs back and tucks it behind square
Axar goes straight, and clears the ropes! Second six for him! Tossed up on off, in the slot for him and he gets under it nicely, pumping it down the ground with a clean swing

flat outside off, back of a length, Axar looks to hoist it off the back foot over extra cover but ends up slicing it in the air off the outside half. It loops over point who gives chase and hunts it down
overpitched on middle, Kohli flicks it to deep midwicket
length ball outside leg, cramps Axar for room as he advances down the track and he has to settle for a single to mid-off. Gently punches it to the fielder
back of a length just outside off, Kohli dabs it to backward point
128.4kph, slower ball floated up just outside off, Kohli hangs back and drives through point
141.5kph, short of length delivery down the leg-side, Axar looks to pull but misses
back of a length across off, 141.5kph, Axar hangs back looking to use the pace towards deep third but is beaten as he goes with the angled bat
short of length at the body, around the chest, and Axar plays a crisp short-arm pull through midwicket

brilliant strike! Fuller than a length on off, Axar clears the front leg and hammers it straight down the ground, offering the full face. He gets a good chunk of it and clears long-on comfortably. Rabada under pressure early in the over
back of a length across off stump as Rabada switches to over the wicket. It's an off-pace delivery at 130kph and Axar cuts to sweeper cover
Kohli steps out, gets a short ball and it flies over his head as he goes for the pull half-heartedly. Umpire calls it a wide

Direct hit at the non-striker's end and South Africa are celebrating. What was Axar doing there? Sloppy running from him and he's a few inches short of the ground. Back of a length delivery down leg, Kohli misses and it goes off his thigh pad to the left of de Kock. Axar comes down looking for a single when it's clearly not on, but he does have the time to make it back home if he charges back immediately. However, he doesn't expect the throw to come at his end and is slow to turn around. De Kock catches him by surprise. A superb knock ends in clumsy fashion. Axar run out (de Kock) 47(31) [4s-1 6s-4]
full on off, Kohli whips it to long-on
fuller than a length around off, Dube looks to swing first ball and gets an inside edge onto pad. Interesting from Dube
Dube makes room and steps out. It's back of a length at the stumps and he mistimes the cut through point
Dube has come out swinging! Good length delivery on off, mid-on is in the ring and he lofts it beautifully over the fielder. Was the slower ball from Jansen and Dube got hold of it nicely
short of length at the body, slower one, Dube tucks it gently behind square
short of length outside off, line is quite wide but Kohli still goes for the pull shot. Ends up dragging it off the toe-end to Jansen
slower bouncer around the head, gets big on Kohli as he goes for the pull and he miscues it in the air. No one at short fine leg though. He gets away with it
full toss on leg stump, follows Dube as he makes room and he swipes it without much timing to deep midwicket

slower length ball on leg stump, Kohli steps out looking for a big shot but the ball sticks in the pitch. He ends up dragging it off the inside half to deep midwicket. Goes on the bounce to the fielder
length ball turning down leg, Kohli glances it to short fine
beauty from Shamsi! Tossed up on middle and off, drifts in, dips sharply, lands on a length and turns away. Dube is tentatively forward in defence and he's beaten on the outside edge
tossed up just outside off, lands in the blockhole as Dube looks to go big and he squeezes it off the toe-end to short third
tossed up on leg, Kohli goes for a slog-sweep but doesn't quite get hold of it. Goes on the bounce to deep midwicket

Dube nails the slog-sweep and it goes to the boundary like a rocket! Tossed up outside off, line is a bit wide but with Dube's reach, he gets hold of it. Smashes it wide of the fielder at deep midwicket, one bounce and over the ropes
flatter and slightly shorter outside off. Dube slaps it along the ground to long-off
back of a length across off, Dube looks to cut but chops it off a thick under-edge wide of point

pops up in the air after taking a bit of glove, de Kock dives full stretch to the left but can't get to it. Kohli gets away. Back of a length on leg stump, slower leg-cutter, he looks to pull but fails to get hold of it
short of length on middle and leg, not giving much room, and Dube pulls to long-on
146.7kph yorker just outside off, Kohli squeezes it to point
first fifty of the tournament for Kohli! Has taken his time getting there. Dug in short, around head height, and he pulls to deep square leg
oh brilliantly done! Dube doing a good job for India here. Short of length on off, he makes his own width by stepping away to the leg-side and slaps it hard through backward point
Kohli cuts loose! Length ball around off, he clears the front leg, slogs hard and gets enough to clear long-on. Those wrists coming into play as they so often do, helping him get under the ball
yorker at the toes, Kohli gets the bat down in time and squeezes it away through midwicket. Charges back for two

four more for Kohli and the Indian fans are loving it in the crowd! Slower short ball, follows Kohli as he backs away but he makes the adjustment, getting on top of the bounce and pulling it past short fine
gives the charge, gets a full toss on the pads and whips it to deep midwicket
oh that's very wide outside off. Wayward full toss, Dube lets it go and de Kock does well to cut it off
goes for a wide yorker, ends up as a low full toss and Dube slices it to deep backward point
142.7kph, good yorker on off and Kohli can't do much with it other than squeeze it down to long-on

De Kock throws the ball in the air in celebration but Kohli looks confident he hasn't edged it. Oh hang on, it doesn't matter. Jansen has overstepped. Wide yorker outside off, Kohli looks to drive but is beaten. There was no edge - the bat touched the ground which produced the noise. Free hit coming up
slower bouncer wide of off, Kohli advances and looks to pull but is beaten. Was that outside the marker? Kohli was hoping for a wide but the umpire says no
full toss on the pads, poor delivery and Kohli whips it away over short fine leg. It beats the fielder in the deep as well
wide length ball outside off, 126.2kph, and Kohli has to reach out as he looks to drive. He mistimes it off the toe-end to the right of mid-off

Kohli turning it on and the crowd are on their feet! Huge six over long-on! Slower length ball on off, he clears the front leg, sets himself up with a steady base, swings hard and tonks it over wide long-on for a 95-meter six

Miscued in the air this time and the catch is taken! Kohli falls! Short of length on off, slower one, and he doesn't get hold of it as he goes for the pull shot. Probably gets it high on the bat and it goes only as far as long-on. Kohli c Rabada b Marco Jansen 76(59) [4s-6 6s-2]
another slower short ball and it gets big on Pandya as he goes for the pull shot. But he gets lucky. It takes a thick top-edge and flies over the keeper
targets the wide yorker but misses his mark and bowls it too wide outside off
141.3kph, fuller than a length on middle, in the slot for Dube but he's a bit late on it. Miscues the slog off the inside half in front of deep midwicket
cracking yorker at 144.6kph. It's right at the base of middle and Pandya squeezes it to mid-off

full outside off, in the slot and Dube hammers it straight down the ground, beating the diving mid-on fielder to his right. WIth mid-on in the ring, Nortje needs to go a lot wider than this. This was right in the arc

Low full toss just outside off, Dube fails to get under it and hits it straight to long-off. Hardly got any elevation on it as he tried launching it down the ground. Shivam Dube c Miller b Nortje 27(16) [4s-3 6s-1]
full and wide outside off, over 147kph, Jadeja reaches out and slices it over point. The fielder in the deep didn't pick it immediately, but he cuts it off

Sliced in the air, and a good catch from Maharaj! India finish with 176. Fuller than a length outside off, slanted away from the left-hander who looks to slog but gets it off the outside half. It loops in the air in front of extra cover where Maharaj does well running across. Jadeja c Maharaj b Nortje 2(2)176

batters.name: Quinton de Kock
batters.dismissal_info: c Kuldeep Yadav b Arshdeep Singh

batters.name: David Miller
batters.dismissal_info: c Suryakumar Yadav b Hardik Pandya

batters.name: Kagiso Rabada
batters.dismissal_info: c Suryakumar Yadav b Hardik Pandya

balls.commentary: gentle inswinger, watchful defence from Reeza

edgedd but doesn't carry! Dies on Pant who dived forward to take that on the bounce. 120kph slower delivery, totally deceived Reeza and sucked him into an early push, luckily for Reeza and the Proteas it didn't carry
1 run, gets it too straight now, but Reeza misses the glance, ball rolls to short fine leg off the thigh pad
full and swinging away, de Kock watchfully plays the outie to mid-on
nicely plays as he guides this outswinging short of length delivery to deep backward point

Arshdeep grunts as he gives width on this fullish delivery. Got the length and line wrong and he's livid with himself for releasing pressure. Reeza stays back and cuts into the ground between point and short third
beaten on the angle! Short of a length angling away, QdK plays inside the line and gets beaten
1 run, oh freebie and he's missed out! Full and down leg, QdK was hoping for a tickle but it went off the pad and Pant managed to halfstop that ball

How do I play that look from Reeza! The coaches and experts often keep telling batters about Bumrah's cunning angle and how it's tough to play him with that wide angle. But he's bowling some lovely genuine outswingers too to make life hell for batters and this is an unplayable ball. I was definitely not expecting it to swing from Bumrah kind of reaction to that ball from Reeza. Length and moving away very late, squaring up the batter and hitting top of off. One of the most satisfying feelings for a pacer, more so if you make the batter look clueless. Reeza Hendricks b Bumrah 4(5) [4s-1]
oh he's timed that sweetly and found the gap. Short of a length outside off stump, Markram opens the bat face and guides it past point, finds the gap in the deep too
let me respect that short of length delivery kind of leave from Markram
targetting the off stump, Markram defends and a solid defence

oh he got away with a full ball, not the length to be bowling on this pitch and interesting to see QdK play within himself than look to drive over the infield. He wanted a boundary along the ground but mid-on cut that drive off
pace off and very full hoping to trick Markram into an easy drive for a catch at cover but it's too full and Markram dabs to point

Aiden Markram has edged that and Pant dives forward to complete a regulation catch. Rohit is absolutely elated. Runs with a pointed finger. Was Arshdeep his matchup plan to Markram? Was a length delivery angling across, Markram tries to drive on the rise, goes hard and it's a thick edge through to the keeper. Great start for India now that Arshdeep too gets in the act. Markram c Pant b Arshdeep Singh 4(5) [4s-1]
wide of off stump, Stubbs drives square of the wicket on the off-side

didn't look out and stays not out. Looked like Rohit just chanced his review there. Was a short delivery that rushed de Kock on the pick up pull that he's a master at. Missed it completely. Pant was so confident he heard something. Arshdeep wasn't keen but Rohit went with Pant and India lose one review
full slower delivery, de Kock drives to mid-on

he's guided that past the slip fielder. Oh that should have been stopped, at least half-stopped. Short of a length delivery angling away, there is a slip and short third but de Kock has managed to guide it perfectly between them

full and outside off stump, de Kock leans forward and drives to deep extra-cover. Oh Kuldeep seems to be struggling in that chase, even slips a bit and releases a weak throw. Grimaces at something. Hope he's not done any damage to himself
worked away calmly to deep square leg
short of length delivery, Stubbs knocks it to the on-side
this time slightly fuller and on the off stump and drawing the batter forward, Stubbs plays a confident push to cover
short of length on the stumps and too straight, Stubbs wrists it to fine leg
Stubbs moved across to sweep it in the gap but can't get it away past behind square
lovely late cut. Pace on and sliding, Stubbs picked up in front of off stump, cuts and it spins past the diving fielder at backward point
flat and on the stumps, Stubbs pushes it to hand
advances and drives to long-off
too short and easy for de Kock to hang back and slaps it over cover for a crucial boundary to maximize this over. South Africa will feel a little better with this over
oh he's guided this nicely again but this time backward point (Arshdeep) dives to the right and saves the boundary
short enough for de Kock to nudge to short fine leg
thick edgeeee and it flies over point. Shortish outside off stump, Stubbs swings hard, gets away with the edge
full ball, Stubbs looks to smack down the ground, SKY dives to the left at long-on and makes a half-stop
full and turning back in, Stubbs looks to launch over mid-off but bat turns in his hands and it goes to long-on
well bowled! QdK advances, Kuldeep Yadav shortens his length and forces a defence

cuts and gets it in the gap past backward point. Very good over for South Africa to better that powerplay and more importantly, they have taken 10 off the last two PP overs and both off India's key bowlers. This one had width and de Kock cut it nicely for four
flatter delivery on the off stump, Stubbs backs away and punches it to deep cover
backs away for a big hit but smashes this drive to long-off
Stubbs is in the zone! Axar bowls full and slot, Stubbs knees down and nails the slog-sweep for a lovely boundary past deep mid-wicket
quicker delivery, Stubbs punches it off the back foot to deep point
oh he wanted to paddle that fine to the boundary past short fine leg but he's picked out the man at 45
now goes for the slog-sweep and tries to drag it behind square but he misses and gets hit on the body. Decent comeback from Axar with two dots

poor from Kuldeep Yadav. He was overpitching to RHBs last game as well. Now he dishes out a freebie slot ball and Stubbs muscles the off-drive for four. This is brilliant batting. Pressure back on India now
turning back in, Stubbs wrists it to long-on
full delivery down leg, de Kock only digs it out to short fine leg
turning back in, Stubbs wrists it to deep mid-wicket
full and outside off stump, de Kock looks to drive, mistimes to the bowler

Quinton is taking it on in style! Full and in the slot again, de Kock says thank you very much and nails the slog sweep onto the roof over deep mid-wicket. This is great batting. Isn't trying to hit every ball, but is picking the right ones to nail as well

South Africa getting a great grip on the game now. Flatter delivery on the stumps, Stubbs goes for the slog sweep and just manages to time it well enough for six but the key was placement and he split deep backward square and deep mid-wicket perfectly
quicker delivery, punched off the back foot to deep cover
goes for the reverse sweep and edges it onto the pad to short mid-wicket
tries to cut it past point but picks out the fielder

This is a gift from Tristan Stubbs. Lucky wicket for India and Axar. QdK throws his head back and punches his bat with the glove in disappoint to suggest a reaction of "Whyyy Stubbsyy?" Stubbs wanted to sweep fine but he's moved a mile to the off-side, Axar cleverly slipped a yorker in and got it to dip as well. Stubbs was in no position to connect and ball hit the base of off stump. India somehow manage to break this ominous 58-run stand. Tristan Stubbs b Axar 31(21) [4s-3 6s-1]
1 run, oh rushes him with a quicker delivery, misses the glance, ball rolls to the on-side
short of length delivery outside off stump, Klaasen punches it to cover
short of length delivery on the stumps, Klaasen flicks and it goes uppishly to mid-wicket
oh three dots now! Klaasen wanted to slap this short of length delivery off the back foot through the off-side, but it's an under edge that rolls to the left of mid-wicket
and he makes a mockery of those three dots. Short, slow and standing up to say hit me please. Klaasen stays leg-side, says thank you so much and slaps it over cover for a six
1 run, pace off, Klaasen works it to long-on. Oh dear, he's overstepped and QdK has a free-hit

that's caught by Pant but it doesn't matter because it's the freehit. QdK livid with himself for missing out on a slot ball. Was there to be hit down the ground but he mishit this horribly high to the keeper
shortish delivery, Klaasen runs it down to backward square leg. Started the over so well there but finished really poor
flat delivery darting onto the stumps. Klaasen makes some room and punches it towards sweeper cover
in the air.... just short!! Flat delivery at leg stump, de Kock stays back and pulls it towards deep mid-wicket. Gets to the man on the bounce
bowl in the arc to him and Heinrich Klaasen will murder you!! Too full, pitches under the bat and Klaasen stays in his crease to smoke it over long-off for his second six of the chase
flat and wide, Klaasen gets closer to cut it towards sweeper cover
with the arm towards middle and off, de Kock tucks it towards mid-wicket. The bowler chases after it as Axar charges in from the boundary, allows SA to complete a couple
arm ball outside off, cut towards the left of backward point for a single
spinning away from outside off. De Kock gets closer and cuts it square of the wicket
on a length and with the arm towards off, Klaasen punches it towards extra cover off the backfoot

out of here!! Too short and wide outside off, Klaasen stays deep and lofts it off the backfoot over extra cover for a maximum. Incredible skill on show to execute a shot like that and make it look like backyard cricket in the process...
on the pads and fuller, swept towards deep backward square leg
fuller and spinning away from off, defended
shortens the length and gets it to spin away outside off, de Kock tried to cut it away but can't connect
on a length on leg, turned towards deep backward square leg

top shot!! The shortest part of the ground and that's the area Nasser Hussain mentioned at the pitch report that de Kock would target. A length ball angling into the batter, de Kock shuffles in and pulls it from his thighs over short fine for a flat six

Same ball, different result!! A length ball angling onto the pads, de Kock tried to pull it behind square but Kuldeep from short fine was pushed to the boundary. Straight down his throat and India get a timely breakthrough. T Dileep who was standing behind Kuldeep celebrates the most animatedly, everyone recognises the value of this wicket. de Kock c Kuldeep Yadav b Arshdeep Singh 39(31) [4s-4 6s-1]
cuts in off the deck from a length, skids onto the back thigh pad of Miller
fuller and almost sliding down leg stump, turned towards fine leg
good length and angling across to just outside off, cut to the left of extra cover's dive to sneak a couple of runs
fuller and sliding onto leg, clipped towards deep mid-wicket for a couple
slow and spinning outside off, Miller taps it towards backward point
floated slightly fuller on off, Miller with a big sweep across the line towards deep square
pushed quicker and on the pads, turned to deep mid-wicket

pure timing from Miller!! It's like he got a geometric compass and measured that shot for perfection. Slightly shorter on off, Miller cuts it in front of square to beat extra cover and then it always runs away from sweeper cover

finishes with a six!! A flat delivery on middle and leg, Miller stays in his crease and pulls it over deep mid-wicket into the stands. For all his heroics in the earlier games, Kuldeep ends the big final with 0/45.
smoked!! On a length and at the stumps, Klaasen makes room, stays deep and whacks it over the bowler's head for a straight boundary
too far wide outside off
once again tries to hide it outside off, too wide
some extra bounce on this length ball outside off, goes over Klaasen's attempted cut

on the roof.... That's the shot that got so many joy to SRH fans throughout the IPL season but it only brings pain today!! A full delivery on off, Klaasen shuffles in and whacks it over deep mid-wicket into the stands for a 99m six!!
another one!! Too short and flat from Axar. Klaasen stays deep and smacks it over long-on for a maximum. Is this the over that's turned the tide for South Africa?

22 from the over already!! Fired full and wide, Klaasen gets under it and gets closer and hoist his drive over extra cover for a flat boundary. Not many have made Axar Patel look so mediocre, but that's what a quality player of spin gets you
flat and wide, Klaasen miscues it off the toe end but gets it over backward point for a couple of runs. A very costly, potentially game altering over here from Axar.
on a length and was the cutter, moving away after pitching. Catches an inside edge and past the stumps towards fine leg

good length at the stumps, turned to deep mid-wicket. That's a 23 ball 50 for Heinrich Klaasen, what an innings this has been from South Africa's middle order stalwart. Had a clear role to bash spin today and took Axar and Kuldeep to the cleaners.
fuller and angling inwards onto the pads. A half appeal from Bumrah but this is going down leg
superb yorker from Bumrah, almost sneaks under the bat!! Klaasen just about digs it out into the pitch
on the pads and full, clipped towards deep backward square leg
full and slightly wide, driven to extra cover

A wicket that's given some hope to over a billion fans!! Golden arm Hardik Pandya strikes at a very crucial juncture. A superb slower, full delivery outside off. Klaasen goes chasing and gets an outside edge through to Pant. End of a superb, potentially match winning knock from Heinrich Klaasen. Klaasen c Pant b Hardik Pandya 52(27) [4s-2 6s-5]
full outside off, driven into the pitch towards mid-off
full and slightly wide, neat square drive from Jansen to get off the mark
on a length at the stumps, skids through. Clipped behind square for a single
full just outside off, Jansen shuffles in to drive and gets a thick inside half towards long-on
banged in shorter on the body, Miller with a swivel pull towards deep backward square leg. What a clutch over from Hardik Pandya, concedes just four and gets the wicket of Klaasen
superb delivery!! On a length and straightens after pitching just outside off from round the wicket. Squares up Miller and beats his outside edge
fuller in length on off, pushed towards extra cover. These dot balls are golddust for Team India!
good length and a bit wide, punched square of the wicket for a single

Clone a bit of that right hand and give it to the best scientists all over the world to make plenty of Jasprit Bumrahs for the future. Because that right hand of this esteemed pacer is one of the most valuable things for Indian cricket. A superb inswinger, nips in after pitching on off stump and gets Jansen on the inside edge. The batter tried a simple defence. nothing extravagant and was beaten all ends up. Knocks the top of leg stump and Jasprit Bumrah celebrates. There is life in this game, the Indians voices are getting loud again.  Marco Jansen b Bumrah 2(4)
fuller and skids through to off stump. Maharaj just about defends
on a length onto off stump, pushed towards covers for a single. Superb spell from Bumrah but he's done for the day.
fuller and angling onto middle, Maharaj tried to turn it leg side and gets a leading edge back towards the bowler
dot ball!! Angling across with a bit of extra bounce. A slash and a miss for Maharaj
length ball angling to off, Maharaj shuffles in and pulls it towards deep mid-wicket
back of length and angling onto the body, Miller backs away and pulls it towards deep square for a couple. Didn't connect off the middle
yorker from Arshdeep, Miller can't get under it and gets a thick inside edge towards deep backward square leg
superb yorker from Arshdeep, right in the blockhole. Stabbed back towards the bowler. What a penultimate over from Arshdeep, he's really come through in pressure moments for India

What a catch!! What a time to do that. Give SKY the fielding medal right now for this game. Of all the stars in the SKY, Surya is the brightest!!.. A low wide full toss from Hardik, Miller gets in line and heaves it through the line. Gets enough power behind it although it was off the toe-end. Flies towards long-off and was going over but Surya appears out of nowhere to pluck it out as he moves to his left, and then juggle it up as he was going over the ropes. Had the feet millimetres away from the cushions too, did well not to step on it, lobs it back in as he goes out, comes back in, steadies himself and completes the catch. Such composure under pressure, that's what potentially wins you trophies!! Hardik and his final overs for India. He pulled off a miracle v Bangladesh in 2016. Can he do it here again?  Miller c Suryakumar Yadav b Hardik Pandya 21(17) [4s-1 6s-1]
edged and runs away... Full and angling across, Rabada goes for a big slog and gets an outside edge to the left of Pant. Third-man inside the circle, four runs!!
1 run, full and angling wide outside off, a swing and miss for Rabada. South Africa sneak a bye
1 run, fires it full onto the boots. Maharaj can't swing it away, deflects off the pads towards mid-wicket
oops.. gets it too wide outside off. Hardik will have to reload

Gone!! And with that wicket goes South Africa's chance of clinching a first ICC trophy. A full delivery outside off, a bit of a half volley and Rabada can't fully get under it. Swings down the ground and holes out to long-off. Suryakumar Yadav makes no mistake. Rabada c Suryakumar Yadav b Hardik Pandya 4(3) [4s-1]

India are T20 Champions and Rohit has managed to end India's 11-year trophy drought!! A full delivery angling onto leg stump, the batter heaves it towards mid-wicket. Gets to Arshdeep after a couple of bounces. The Indian players are on their knees, drained out off all their energy. Rohit Sharma is on the ground, Hardik is on his knees, he's tearing away as he becomes a national hero, an immortal for India
